titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Afghanistan
Afghanistan

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no legislation for the systematic declassification of government documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Beside Conservatory of Music, Salang Watt Street, Kabul.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Malak Azghar Road, Kabul.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Documents at the National Archives have suffered damage from improper storage and the archivists are working to restore them. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has an Archive Directorate. Researchers should contact it to assess the feasibility of research.
